casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christina Shea WALTERS 548A00-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2017 Shelagh R. Kenney, Attorney at Law, Malcolm Ray Hunter, Jr., Attorney at Law, Durham, for Walters, Christina Shea. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of March 2017 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2017."
